prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with bright blue wings and a sleek body design.
I want a creature that resembles a bat but is more vibrant and colorful.
Generate a Pokemon that has a unique blend of blue and black colors, perfect for night exploration.
Make a small, agile Pokemon that can navigate through caves and forests effortlessly.
Imagine a bat-like Pokemon with large wings and a playful personality, ideal for aerial battles.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, showcasing a mix of urban and natural colors.
Give me a Pokemon that can adapt to both forest and cave habitats, with a striking blue appearance.
